text: Bill Bonds (February 23, 1932 â€“ December 13, 2014) was an American television anchor and reporter. He was best known for his work at WXYZ-TV in Detroit, Michigan. Bonds became an Action News anchorman beginning in the early 1970s. Bonds died at his home in Southfield, Michigan on December 13, 2014, from a heart attack.Bill Bonds, iconic former Channel 7 Action News anchorman, has died , WXYZ, Dec 13, 2014 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American television presenters Category:People from Detroit
title: Bill Bonds
